overview:
Michael Harder has over 30 years of corporate financial, and executive management experience.

Prior to joining Oxford Networks, Mike was with Jordan’s Meats in Portland Maine for 10 years with his last responsibility being CEO. For 20 years prior to joining Jordan’s, Mike worked for the Colgate Palmolive Company, completing assignments in the USA, Asia and Africa.

Harder holds an MBA Degree in International Finance and Economics from Fairleigh Dickinson University in New Jersey and a BBA in Accounting from Pace University in New York. He resides in Yarmouth with his wife Jane, and is the father of three sons.
